definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Nu 10:9 adversary, foe;—abs. [[חַר]] Am 3:11 +, even c. art. [[הַצַּר]] Nu 10:9, but also [[הַצָּר]] Es 7:4; [[חָָר]] Zec 8:10 +; pl. [[חָרִים]] La 1:7; cstr. [[חָרֵי]] Ezr 4:1 + Is 9:10 (but read prob. [[חָרוֹ]] or [[חָרָיו]], cf. Di-Kit Che:Hpt; al. [[שָׂרֵי]]), Je 48:5 (del. LXX Hi Gie), Ez Eze 30:16 (but LXX Sm [[וְנׇפׂחוּ]], so Berthol; Co [[וְנִפְרְחוּ]], so Toy; Krae [[יׇעוּף]]); sf. [[חָרַי]] Ps 3:2, [[חָרֵיהֶם]] Ez Eze 39:23, [[חָרֵימוֹ]] De 32:27, etc.;—adversary, foe, Am 3:11, Ge 14:20, Nu 10:9 (P), Nu 24:8 (JE) De 32:27, De 33:7, Jos 5:13 (JE), 2Sa 24:13, Is 9:10 (v. supr.), Zec 8:10 Ezr 4:1 Ne 4:5 Es 7:6 ([[אִישׁ חַר וְאוֹיֵב]]), + 21 t., + Ps 3:2, Ps 13:5, Ps 27:2, Ps 78:42, + 13 t. Psalm Psalm, + (of ´[[י]]'s foes) Ps 78:66, Ps 97:3; + (of ´[[י]]'s foes) also Is 1:24, Is 26:11, Is 59:18, Is 64:1, Je 46:10, Na 1:2, De 32:41, De 32:43, Job 19:11.—Je 48:5, Ez Eze 30:16 v. supr.
